AboutMe

A true passion by chance. I began my journey purely from curiosity, ever since my first "Hello World" was produced in the console I've been hooked. This has never been just a job to me. It has now become a way of life. I'm constantly thinking about apps I'm working on from the time I wake up until the time I fall asleep. I love engaing in challenging tasks that help me learn and grow (level Up) as a Front End Developer. What started as a simple "Hello World" has now become a full-fledged passion that only continues to get more exciting everyday.
